question: Did Rasoolullah s.a.w.s. ever pray 4 Rakaats together with a single Salaam outside of Fardh Salaat? Kindly quote any Hadiths that mentions this.
answer:
QUESTION
From my understanding he used to always pray in increments of 2 Rakaat whenever he offered any Nafl or Sunnah Salaat. Please correct me if I am wrong.
ANSWER


Share:
Nabi (Sallallahu alaihi wasallam) would perform nafl salah at times in increments of two rakaat, sometimes 4 rakaat, sometimes six and sometimes eight.

The ahadith showing them are present in most books of hadith. We will give a reference for each:

4 Rakaat: Sahih Bukhari (No.3376)

6 Rakaat and 8 : Sharhu Ma'anil Aathaar of Tahawi Vol.1 Pg.364(Ilmiyyah), Sunanul Kubra of Nasai (No.1414),

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Ml. Husain Kadodia
